item.title: Full Primal Release: GZipped with ints and everything
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“rhys132, post:15, topic:344810”][quote author=alijon link=topic=441186.msg3578218#msg3578218 date=1303596894]
how can i make it so it is not used as a weapon the body the helm the shield are all used as weapon they are used in the weapon place not the correct ones and when i use datmaker to make it proper it makes it invisible and freezes client maybe idk how to make them correct so can someone help me?
[/quote]
anyone got models for pi :D[/quote]

Please fall in a hole.

Read full topic

item.title: Full Primal Release: GZipped with ints and everything
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Remember to add the models by typing the following in your client:

add models #### -or- add model ####

Remember to add them in the appropriate section in item4.java, and compile the client several times, I know it sounds strange but it fixed any glitches I had with items.

Read full topic

item.title: Full Primal Release: GZipped with ints and everything
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Full primal armor without the shield, and the boots are glitchy
DL: http://uppit.com/hpx2ut06ks7l/Primal_Release.zip
Ingame: http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=169280l&s=6

I’ll update the ints with the correct rotations soon, but I figured everyone would want this all ready for them

EDIT: Updated ints. Inventory models should look better now Not perfect, but definitely better.

if(i == 13524) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 1000; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1001; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1001; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 1000; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 540; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 0; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Primal Boots"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "Primal Boots.".getBytes(); // Item Examine class8.aStringArray168 = null; } if(i == 13525) // Your desired item id (the one you use after ::pickup ##### #) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 1002; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1003; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1003; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Primal Chainbody"; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anInt174 = 1004; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 1005; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 1005; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1;
